basics.name: Ka'ili Benavente
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii and a B.A. in Korean For Professionals in the Korean Language Flagship Center. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee schedules of technicians and clients
Make calls and payments through preferred system
Keep up sanitary needs of salon
Assist teachers in student care and instruction
Help prepare and deliver materials for lessons
Communication between various staff covering different subjects

volunteer.organization: Supporting Women In Tech and Computing Hawai'i
volunteer.summary: Participating in the organization and planning of events and promotion, including weekend volunteer work with girl-scouts and K-12 students to introduce STEM and Robotics.

awards.title: Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to Hawai'i-resident incoming freshmen who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with an overall GPA of 3.6 or higher at a Hawai'i public school.
